document.full_text: the man of steel, in the latest issue of action comics which hit newsstands on wednesday, said he intends to renounce his u.s. citizenship in a speech before the united nations.
document.title: superman threatens to renounce u.s. citizenship
lines_and_colors: the man of steel, in the latest issue of action comics which hit newsstands on wednesday, said he intends to renounce his u.s. citizenship in a speech before the united nations.
